name: Jam Scram
description:
Jam Scram is a fast-paced restaurant management game focused on jam! Cook your way through the endless supply of customers to become the ultimate jam overlord!

Controls:

  • Click and hold to pickup items
  • Release to drop items
  • Right click with tools to interact

Jam Scram was created in 8 days for the 9th Kindred Game Jam.
